Everyday Life.description: Covers informal conversations in daily life, such as within families, between friends, or while managing everyday tasks. Tone is usually casual and spontaneous.
Everyday Life.core_purpose: Handle personal tasks, maintain relationships, manage routine life

Intra-family.description: Conversations among family members including parenting, caregiving, and household coordination.
Intra-family.core_purpose: Support family function and emotional connection

Friends and Acquaintances.description: Informal social chat, including gossip, event updates, or casual bonding.

Daily Services.description: Interactions in stores, restaurants, or transportation.
Daily Services.core_purpose: Get things done or receive services

Public Services.description: Interactions in banks, hospitals, or city services regarding procedures or documentation.
Public Services.core_purpose: Access or understand public or administrative services

Workplace & Organizational.description: Goal-oriented conversations in professional settings. Tone is formal or semi-formal, focusing on task execution and coordination.

Internal Communication.description: Dialogue between colleagues for updates, alignment, and task tracking.
Internal Communication.core_purpose: Ensure team alignment and progress tracking

External Collaboration.description: Interactions with clients, vendors, or partners around deals, deliverables, and negotiations.
External Collaboration.core_purpose: Drive business objectives and fulfill agreements

Talent & HR.description: Conversations around hiring, onboarding, feedback, or exit interviews.
Talent & HR.core_purpose: Evaluate, train, or retain human resources

Service Operations.description: Logistics and coordination in customer-facing roles like hospitality or retail.
Service Operations.core_purpose: Deliver quality service and solve issues

Expert & High-Stakes.description: Professional, technical, or regulated dialogues requiring precision and expertise.
Expert & High-Stakes.core_purpose: Provide specialized advice, resolve critical issues, ensure compliance

Medical.description: Doctor-patient or caregiver conversations on diagnosis, treatment, or care.

Legal & Law Enforcement.description: Dialogues involving legal counsel, police questioning, or court proceedings.
Legal & Law Enforcement.core_purpose: Establish facts, determine liability, enforce rights

Education & Training.description: Teacher-student or trainer-learner conversations on knowledge transfer.

Finance & Insurance.description: Advisory or claims-related dialogue in financial institutions.
Finance & Insurance.core_purpose: Protect assets, plan finances, manage risk

Technical & Engineering.description: Problem-solving among engineers, technicians, or IT operators.

Digital & Human-Machine.description: Conversations in virtual environments or between humans and AI systems.
Digital & Human-Machine.core_purpose: Assist users, retrieve information, enable interaction

Social Media Chat.description: Conversational messages via DM, comments, or forums.
Social Media Chat.core_purpose: Engage socially, express opinions, maintain online presence

Gaming & Virtual Worlds.description: In-game coordination and role-play among players.
Gaming & Virtual Worlds.core_purpose: Achieve goals in digital games or simulations

AI & Smart Assistants.description: Interaction with intelligent systems or home devices via voice or text.
AI & Smart Assistants.core_purpose: Trigger actions, ask for help, automate tasks

Content Creation.description: Podcasts, interviews, or co-creation talks during media production.
Content Creation.core_purpose: Plan or generate media content collaboratively

Cross-Context & Hybrid.description: Multifaceted scenarios where work, family, legal, or emotional topics overlap. Often fast-changing and emotionally loaded.
Cross-Context & Hybrid.core_purpose: Navigate overlapping responsibilities and resolve multi-role conflicts

Work-from-Home Conflicts.description: Remote work interfered with by family or household needs.
Work-from-Home Conflicts.core_purpose: Balance job focus with home responsibilities

Medical Care + Family Planning.description: Joint discussions about elder care, child illness, or medical appointments.
Medical Care + Family Planning.core_purpose: Make informed, compassionate health decisions together

Emotional + Educational.description: Where education discussions (teacher/parent) blend with behavior/emotional issues.
Emotional + Educational.core_purpose: Address learning challenges and emotional wellbeing

Legal + Workplace.description: Employee/employer disputes, legal consultation, or HR investigations.
Legal + Workplace.core_purpose: Protect rights, resolve disputes, follow protocol
